text: Pas pojdori kun, hamcunon ki pajomʙaroni ululazm (ʙoazm) pojdori karda ʙudand, Va dar uquʙatason sitoʙ makun. On ruz, ki on va'daero, ki ʙa onho doda suda, ʙingarand, pindorand, ki cuz ʙa qadri so'ate az ruz dar gur namonda ʙudand. In rasonidani pajƣom ast. Ojo cuz nofarmonon ʙa halokat merasand
